title: Zinc(II)-berberine-based complexes targeting mitochondria exhibit enhanced antiproliferative activity as single drugs or in combination with ABT-199.
abstract: Myeloid cell leukemia-1 (Mcl-1), a protein mainly located in mitochondria, exhibits antiapoptotic activity, promoting tumor growth. Herein, we designed an innovative strategy for targeting mitochondria to inhibit Mcl-1 expression effectively. To this end, we synthesized a novel berberine-based ligand, BerT.
